Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My learning was impacred by the feedback provided by me teacher and AI. I try to fix my mistakes and try to not repeat them. My teachers feedback was more precise and not as general as the one of the AI..

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI made me feel more comfortable because I know my mistakes don't make the AI feel better or worse about me, on the other hand they might affect the opinion my teacher has about me. I am more afraid to repeat my mistakes with my teacher than with AI.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: It was quicker than the feedback from my teacher.
